view

Interface IView2ModelAdapter<TDropListItem>


  • public interface IView2ModelAdapter<TDropListItem>
    This is an interface which has the functions that the view wants the model to have.
    Author:
    sn32, kyl3, lka2, swong

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      TDropListItem addPaintFactory(java.lang.String text) 
      TDropListItem addStrategy(java.lang.String classname)
      This function will take the given short strategy name and return a corresponding something to put onto both drop lists.
      void clearBalls()
      This is a function that will tell the model to clear the balls.
      TDropListItem combineStrategies(TDropListItem selectedItem1, TDropListItem selectedItem2)
      This function will return a new object to put on both lists, given two items from the lists.
      TDropListItem getSwitcherFac()
      This function returns a strategy factory which makes the update strategy that the switcher balls currently have.
      void makeBall(TDropListItem selectedItem, TDropListItem paintStrat)
      This function will make a ball with the selected short strategy name.
      void paintBalls(java.awt.Graphics g)
      This is a function that will tell the model to paint the balls.
      void setSwitcherStrategy(TDropListItem switchFac)
      This function will change the current strategy of the switcher balls to whatever strategy is made by the factory in the parameter.

    • Method Detail

      • clearBalls

        void clearBalls()
        This is a function that will tell the model to clear the balls.

      • paintBalls

        void paintBalls(java.awt.Graphics g)
        This is a function that will tell the model to paint the balls.
        Parameters:
        g - The graphics object to paint on.

      • addStrategy

        TDropListItem addStrategy(java.lang.String classname)
        This function will take the given short strategy name and return a corresponding something to put onto both drop lists.
        Parameters:
        classname - The shortened class name of the desired strategy
        Returns:
        Something to put onto both the drop lists.

      • makeBall

        void makeBall(TDropListItem selectedItem,
              TDropListItem paintStrat)
        This function will make a ball with the selected short strategy name.
        Parameters:
        selectedItem - A shorten class name for the desired strategy
        paintStrat - A shorten class name for desired paint strategy

      • combineStrategies

        TDropListItem combineStrategies(TDropListItem selectedItem1,
                                TDropListItem selectedItem2)
        This function will return a new object to put on both lists, given two items from the lists.
        Parameters:
        selectedItem1 - An object from one drop list
        selectedItem2 - An object from the other drop list
        Returns:
        An object to put back on both lists.

      • setSwitcherStrategy

        void setSwitcherStrategy(TDropListItem switchFac)
        This function will change the current strategy of the switcher balls to whatever strategy is made by the factory in the parameter.
        Parameters:
        switchFac - An object from the top drop list.

      • getSwitcherFac

        TDropListItem getSwitcherFac()
        This function returns a strategy factory which makes the update strategy that the switcher balls currently have.
        Returns:
        An object that creates the switcher balls current update strategy.

      • addPaintFactory

        TDropListItem addPaintFactory(java.lang.String text)
